Mastodon.description: Mastodon is a free and open-source self-hosted social networking service that uses ActivityPub protocol.

Pleroma.description: Pleroma is a free, federated social networking server built on open protocols (ActivityPub).

PeerTube.description: PeerTube is a free and open-source, decentralized, federated video platform powered by ActivityPub and WebTorrent.

Misskey.description: Misskey is an open-source, decentralized social network platform that uses ActivityPub.

Pixelfed.description: Pixelfed is a free and open-source image sharing platform, similar to Instagram but federated via ActivityPub.

Lemmy.description: Lemmy is a federated link aggregator and forum platform, similar to Reddit but using ActivityPub.

Friendica.description: Friendica is a free and open-source distributed social network that uses ActivityPub and other protocols.

Diaspora.description: Diaspora is a nonprofit, user-owned, distributed social network.

GNU Social.description: GNU Social is a free and open-source microblogging server that uses OStatus and ActivityPub protocols.
